feelings.comment:
my problem
is that
when I start
I don't know how to stop
when I love
I don't know how to turn it off
when I give
I don't know how to save anything
for myself.
-giving

they say
desire is
a strong feeling
of wanting to have something
I think of you and
I think of helen
who started a war that lasted ten years
to have the man she loved
I think of michaelangelo
painting for hours and days and years
and permanently damaging his eyes
for the sistine chapel
I think of being nine and playing
in my papa's workshop
and finding a huge magnet
and it getting stuck to the table
it took all the strength my arms had to pry that thing off
today I read
about two starts
spiraling into one another
the energy between them so strong
they distorted space and time
and when they finally combined
they burned bright enough
to be seen
130 million years later
darling
what I have for you
isn't just a strong feeling
I will change the path of history for you
I will risk blindness
I will cling to you so tightly that scientists
will call me a fundamental force of nature
I will cause waves that span galaxies
what I'm trying to say is
if you're ready
I've been waiting
-desire
